name: BurgeroftheDay
0:
”Alexa, ask Belcher's special to give me the burger of the day.”
”Alexa, ask Belcher's special to give me today's burger.”
”Alexa, open Belcher's special.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: belcher's special
des: This skill will deliver a funny "Burger of the Day" pun based on a popular animated TV show. No special set-up is required to get a chuckle from hearing about today's featured burger. Simply ask Alexa to ask Belcher's special to give you the burger of the day and crack a smile.
